Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to eligibility for ordinary disability benefits and re-employment of disability retirees of the New York city police pension fund Tier III plans
Summary: Modifies eligibility for ordinary disability benefits and re-employment of disability retirees of the New York city police pension fund Tier III plans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to eligibility for ordinary disability benefits and re-employment of disability retirees of the New York city police pension fund Tier III plans
